website_summaries.verdict: Soft, cuddly dog pajamas that are well made and perfect for puppies and small and medium breeds.
pros: Soft polyester material will keep dogs warm in cold weather
Has neck and leg elastic that keeps the pajamas in place without being restrictive
Available in numerous fun patterns such as colorful paw prints
cons: Although these pajamas come in different sizes, they run small and aren't suitable for larger breeds

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns and soft fabric, I bought an XS ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute patterns and soft fabric, I bought an XS for my 5lb chihuahua but it didn't fit him very well because he's too long. I gave them to my mother-in-law and she loves them for her yorkie. Mark as helpful if this review helped please :-)
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Slightly shorter than others
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft, well made. Puppy is pictured with an xs and is about 3 lbs
customer_reviews.author: BonnieRNFNP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dog outfit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft cotton outfit and it looks so cute on my dog. The only complaint was the sizing chart was hard to figure out what size to order because the measurements did not fit my dog. I am finding this to be the case on all the dog outfits from many different sellers that I have purchased. After reading many reviews I decided to order both a small and a medium and the small ended up fitting my dog the best. My dog weighs 8 lbs, 15" chest, 14"1/2 length and 9" neck. The shipping was fast and the seller was easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: BRC1

customer_reviews.title: This is made with good quality material cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is made with good quality material cute and soft. I have a toy poodle about 8 pounds. I bought the medium which is a good fit. My only issue is the hind legs do not cover well, so her hind legs keep coming out. I also wish the chest area covered more. I was going to buy a 2nd outfit but I won't because of the fit.
customer_reviews.author: ann w.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this. When it arrived I was happy to find that it fit my dog perfectly with a little room to spare (size M). My dog's measurements are: Chest 16”, Back 10”, Neck 10”. The fabric is so soft. The only scratchy area is where the label is sewn on. Maybe they could imprint the label instead. I'll have to remove the label and the thread it's sewn on with. Will purchase again for my other dog, but might wait to see if they do something about the label.
customer_reviews.author: C Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great alernative to using a cone
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas are a great alternative to using a cone! We were having trouble putting a cone on our dog in order to keep her from licking a hot spot on her hind leg. Fortunately we found these pajamas and they worked like a charm in covering the affected area. The pajamas are so soft and easy to put on. The Large size fit our 14 pound Jack Russell Terrier perfectly! She loves her pajamas and sleeps like a baby in them! Thank you Cutebone!
customer_reviews.author: MelVinsMama

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My frenchton puppy gets cold in the morning! I had not planned to buy pj’s until our heat went out. Then I realized this wasn’t just to be cute. I ordered the size based on measurements. That one was too big, but she will grow into it. So I ordered one size smaller and it fits perfect. Wash before use. Something they spray on them has caused me an allergic reaction, both times. Washing fixed the problem. If it made me miserable, I don’t want it on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Purchade
customer_reviews.text: My hairless dog gets cold even in the summer months because of the ac. These jammed are beautiful and just the right amount of warmth for her. The quality is excellent and I b will order again. Thank you! !!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The onsies are very soft and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are a little off. I measured my dog according to the chart size, the outfit was too long in the legs and to small on the body. I made alterations myself. The onsies are very soft and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: E.Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best PJ's !
customer_reviews.text: Soft and stretchy , not to thick , not to thin . Fit is perfect and I have bought these in 3 different sizes . Holds up to daily wear and playful puppy activity. Toss in the washer and still months later , are like brand new. No loose seams , no tears . Very well made . I have bought many different brands, and have always had to return them because the fit was just not right . These are the only PJ's I will ever buy for my 4 fur kids. 3 Min Pins and a Boston
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grinstead

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!!!
customer_reviews.text: the item runs pretty small. I would definitely order a size large than you are planning too. I have to return my orders of size MED because they are extremely small for my 12 lb. Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: T to the Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small for my 4lb Yorkie. The pjs itself is very cute and comfortable but just a tad bit loose in the front leg area. It serves the purpose though, for puppy being asleep with us and having some warmth with AC running. She falls right to sleep with them on. I wouldnt keep on to walk around the house because it falls off her legs and paws get stuck for us to fix. Overall, cute product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, warm and cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg these were the cutest things ever. We bought two of them for the families that bought two of our teacup Yorkie puppies. They are just almost 2 pounds each and both fit the size XS in these pjs and look the cutest. They are so soft and warm. I love them so much, we’re going to order mommy the same ones
customer_reviews.author: Alexis & Ondray

customer_reviews.title: it's a super soft cuddly jumper
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a super soft cuddly jumper, but NOT at all true to size. I got a large for my large hound and it barely fits my little pug. I don't know what size they have on the big dog in the ad, but that's what I needed. At least the pug is all snuggly
customer_reviews.author: synchronized seaweed

customer_reviews.title: The cutest dog clothes I’ve ever gotten my babies! I’m a sucker for a onesie!
customer_reviews.text: I have about 8 of these in all different prints. My two dogs (a girl Havanese, Gypsy, and a boy Yorkie, [Drew] Brees) who both REALLY love them. They truly seem to prefer these over anything else they have to wear - I think it’s because their back legs are secure and warm, their tummy is warm too, they have freedom to use the potty, etc. they are just cozy and warm and can still run and play and be super comfortable! They are all so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Angelette

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cozy onesie for my sweet pup! It’s soft and she seems very comfortable in it. She’s a 5lb teacup Maltese and I got her a small in this. Normally in clothing I get her a extrasmall but for onesies I always get her a small so she isn’t restricted in her back legs
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great company this one pair had an issue.
customer_reviews.text: This her second pair from cute bone i love them . i keep our bedroom very cold at night and i dont have to worry about her in these. They are super soft . that being said this pair had an issue. The first pair fit perfectly second was way to long on hind legs. I took them up just a bit so she didnt trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Super cute pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: Our little chihuahua looks super cute in these pajamas and that fit her perfectly! They were exactly what we were looking for. Quality made! She weighs 9 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great little PJs, run slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, sturdy feeling fabric and my dog appears to be comfortable, but they do run a little small. I bought a medium for her (a miniature schnauzer), and her measurements are: Back- 12" Chest girth- 17.5" Neck circumference- 11.5-12" You can see her rump sticks out a lot but for my dog specifically, this isn't much of a problem because she just sleeps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, wasnt sure on exact size. I have a lovely senior Jack Russell who weighs 10lb. She is often cold and this is soft and not too hot for her. The medium fit her perfect! The large fits my 18lb Frenchie great👍
customer_reviews.author: christina m. french

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good fit, not lined
customer_reviews.text: XS fit 3lb Chi. Really soft material, BUT... Not really soft inside on their fur (or lack of). Wish it was double material, lined. Well made though!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Tellone

customer_reviews.title: but now it fits great..
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and soft.. my little one loves it.. had to do some sewing on it tho..the length is longer then her..but now it fits great...may order another one.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: Doll Sized
customer_reviews.text: This is not an extra small for a dog. It might be an extra small for a kitten-but most likely this is made for a doll. Sadly, I didn't need to use it until after the return window was closed. VERY UNHAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: AllyB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. My papillion weighs about 6 lbs and she somehow wiggles out of all sweaters. These fit perfectly, warm & comfortable. Chloe cannot wiggle out of these and she stays warm and adorable! Love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Misti0731

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft! They definitely run a bit small, I bought a large for my 20 lb. Shih Tsu. They do fit but are a bit snug. By the next size up if you're not sure which to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cute Ombré Hearts Pajamas for my lil guy. They’re so soft and I know they will keep him cozy the fall and winter. They’re some of the nicest doggie PJ’s I’ve ever purchased and I’ve bought dozens!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: XS Pajamas fit my yorkie perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These xs pajamas are a perfect fit and well made for my 3 pound yorkie. This is the second time I've bought from this company. I've been pleased with both items.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Way to big even going by size chart
customer_reviews.text: I always go by the size chart for our rescue min pin so I ordered him a medium bc it fit his size perfectly. But when I got it the pj was way way too big. I don’t know if this is so cheap or what. I really like it so I might order a small but I don’t want to be let down again
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: I Wouldn't
customer_reviews.text: My cat, a 10 lb tabby, slides right out of this. I thought it would fit a bit more snug. I had purchased a 12 month infant onesie until this arrived. It fit better and stayed on longer than this did. $12 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Naaila Asheed-Moumaris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful PJ's for my Yorkie!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful PJ's for my Yorkie they are so soft, easy to put on and take take off and they wash up so nice! Shipping time was fantastic! Price was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great for my anxious pup
customer_reviews.text: My pup absolutely loves these! They are so soft and fit her great! She weighs 5lbs and the smalls are perfect for her. She has terrible anxiety and feels more confident when she is wearing clothes so any new kind is amazing to find!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT MY 6 LB. DOG
customer_reviews.text: These doggy pajamas are very cute; but I could not get my little chihuahua into them. I missed the return window, so I am stuck with them and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JFo.

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is hard, bought it twice because they are larger than you think. I bought these twice because it's too expensive and time consuming to return anything on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K. KNOWLES

customer_reviews.title: I received this today and love it! The quality is just great and its ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and love it! The quality is just great and its very simple wout extras like bows or heads or things that fall off. So well made and Im purchasing more for sure! I have a 10lbs frenchie puppy and bought M. Its perfect however everything shrinks washed and dried. Ty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are way off. Got a medium for my Boston terrier and no way was it going to fit. Made me sad
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't always like wearing clothes but she didn't mind these pajamas. They're super soft and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is so cute!! I was so nervous about what size to order after reading the reviews. I have a chiweenie so she has tiny legs and wiggles out of everything 😩 the Medium size is perfect but she keeps getting out of the legs even after rolling them up. Otherwise so soft and cute
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft and lightweight, cute design and size small fits my 5.6 lb. toy poodle great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Dog Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pajamas and my puppy looks soooo CUTE in them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small dog
customer_reviews.text: My little dog had several growths removed. Instead of making her wear that plastic hood I bought several of these. She couldn’t get to her stitches and was still comfortable. Worked perfectly and their very cute. Side material and washes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute Runs small, I got my 17lb pug a large Good material and really cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow great for the price
customer_reviews.text: He Just Love Them!! I am so happy with the pajamas. Tyga is 4 lb Yorkshire Terrier and he is an extra small size. So this pajama was a small. So I just took it in where it needed it. My baby looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Going down a size again!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute if they she keeps them on. My my one walks out of them so to the pile they go with the rest of the new cloths they refuse to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: looks very cute
customer_reviews.text: My pup is very stylish in this! keeps her warm after she has been to the groomers.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P. Kocher

customer_reviews.title: Soooo adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! I would say the sizing is not completely accurate I had to return the xs for my 2 lb pup and get a small instead. But overall quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My grandogie is a Yorkie. She is adorable in this and stays so warm and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: June L.

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft and fits great
customer_reviews.text: My pug is about 10lbs and the medium fit perfect . It’s good material and She likes that it’s light weight
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today in size Large and I am loving them. They're super cute and breatheable and fit super nice on my 12 pound Maltese-Bichon mix dog. Definetly check the size chart because he is usually a medium but with this brand he is a large and they fit him really well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Also fits Cats with Special Needs
customer_reviews.text: Super cute p.j.s that we actually bought for our special needs cat that has serious skin allergy issues. Wearing the p.j.s helps keep him from tearing off his medication and bandage that cover his sores. We have to pin at the back of the neck to keep him from slipping out of them. Easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chriselle V

customer_reviews.title: Cute Dog PJ's
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and cute but ran a little small I feel
customer_reviews.author: L. Czyk

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love there pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about these pajamas. They are the first pajamas my dogs actually love to wear. They are so soft and they fit them really well. They look really good on both my male and my female. I have gotten so many complements. I would Definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable! Soft and comfy! My pup is a 17 pound Shih Tzu and the size Large fit her perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Snelling

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not for doxie
customer_reviews.text: Pajamas were cute but didn't work for my tweenie doxie (she is 12lbs) because of her long shape. It's more for long legged dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Amaral Diniz Silva

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft. Only reason for returning was it was too small my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Walton

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely good quality, soft, and easy to put on. My only complaint is that it needs to be more conscious of longer, smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product🐾💗Cute dog Pj's🐾💗
customer_reviews.text: Adorable pet jammies🐾💗 will buy again. Love the pattern, material, and nice product.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Hind legs
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the hind legs will not stay on. I bought these for cold nights for my Yorkie but can't keep them on her back legs.
customer_reviews.author: MauiSC

customer_reviews.title: Dog pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems and it was well liked as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves them! We bought several other styles. They fit perfectly

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Soft And sweet sooo cute on but she keeps getting out of the hind legs. I might just cut the back legs off. Very cute light weight and soft
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! He is a small Yorkie mix, 11lbs, and the medium fits him perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my 6 month old Chihuahua 😇 Order a size xs and it fits perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: It is a little lose on the back legs but he likes his pjs.

customer_reviews.title: I say Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love This is the best pajamas ever. Super cute on my Bella and shes very comfortable in it. I Say Buy !!

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Go by measurements and not what people say I went by what people said and it was too large had to return

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shamrock pajamas are so cute and fit my Miniature Schnauzer just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Spear

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Way too small! I followed the sizing guide and purchased a large for my dog and it did not fit AT ALL! She is a 50lb lab mix. I am definitely disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it but her legs slip out constantly. Had to alter the legs
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Under the sae jammies
customer_reviews.text: Loving these new jammies. Very soft and great quality! Have bought other jammies from cutebone and all of them are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: lily herrington

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered from this company a few times and always gotten the same size but this one was too big on my dog for some reason, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessPandora7

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great fit
customer_reviews.text: To wide for Yorkie Will work well for wider or heavier dog than my 5lb pup. Had to sew the back edge by 3:5 in overlapped came off back legs
customer_reviews.author: RLT

customer_reviews.title: CHECK PET SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: Do what the description says, CHECK YOUR PET BEFORE YOU BUY! I bought this for my adorable Dachshund, Chihuahua and Min Pin mix. She's so small but we can never find clothes that fit her correctly. I ordered this in small size (For real she's super small, I'll attach a photo) and it does not fit her :(. Pretty sure a Medium would, though. It's super cute, fuzzy and pretty strong though!
customer_reviews.author: Leana Vinney

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute. She didn't like them. And only wore them once, but then I gave them to my mother in law for her dog. She loved them.

customer_reviews.title: Soft order up a size or 2
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and soft runs really small. Good for a surgery protector instead of cone.

customer_reviews.text: she comes out of the legs. They don't hold her snug enough.l

customer_reviews.title: These look very cute on her and the size was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: TTS and really well made!

customer_reviews.text: Adorable! A little short lengthwise, but it still fits my pooch.

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely size up!

product_meta.title: CuteBone Dog Pajamas Soft Cat Clothes Cute Puppy Apparel Doggie Jumpsuit Pet Pjs Onesie
feature_bullets: 【Highlight】So cute this amazing kind of pajamas for your dog baby! Different expressions and it's perfect for her/him to wear it to sleep or normal party or just taken photo with you. Of course, it can get friends' more love and attention!

【Craft】4-legs design with elastic waist. Keep your dog warm during cool nights with a comfortable pair of dog pjs. Puppy pajamas are also a good idea as new puppies have less fat than an adult dog to help them keep warm. No needs to worry about midnight potty breaks as many of our dog pajamas have an open belly for easy potty time.【note】Just for dogs!

【Size】 XS-L. Please measure your dog’s body, neck and chest size before buying. Size XS: neck: 9.5’’-10’’, chest: 12’’-12.5’’, length: 7.5’’-8’’. Size S: neck: 9.5’’-10’’, chest: 14’’-14.5’’, length: 9.5’’-10’’. Size M: neck: 9.5’’-10’’, chest: 16’’-16.5’’, length: 12’’-12.5’’. Size L: neck: 11.5’’-12’’, chest: 18’’-18.5’’, length: 14’’-14.5’’. We recommend that you can buy a bigger size for your puppy.
【Scope of application】Suitable for small sized dogs, such as Chihuahua, Poodle,Cup Poodle, Pomeranian, Yorshire Terrier, Bichon Frise, Cocker Spaniel and so on.
